channel.title: 508 Server , click here to read more
channel.description:
[u]Well to explain my problem:[/u]
My problem is , no one else can connect to my 508 Server.
Any one who try 2 connect to my server gets this:
[URL=http://img87.imageshack.us/my.php?image=errorcy0.jpg][IMG]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/2460/errorcy0.th.jpg[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img87.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
Well my no-ip:
[URL=http://img88.imageshack.us/my.php?image=noipduciq0.png][IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/1993/noipduciq0.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
And my Classpath / Path
[URL=http://img227.imageshack.us/my.php?image=pathundclathpathde4.jpg][IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/5976/pathundclathpathde4.th.jpg[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
Well portforward is working because my silab server is working great.
If I start my server and the run.bat :
[url=http://img152.imageshack.us/my.php?image=serverstartbd5.jpg][img=http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8358/serverstartbd5.th.jpg][/url][url=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][img=http://img152.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif][/url]
Well thats it.
-gh0st

item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Well thanks but it’s already the same as in my client , both are 43594.

Rep+ for the help btw.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2008, 05:39:58 am[/size][hr]It can’t be the cache , because if the cache isn’t there , it shows another error. I added the Cache and now it freezes and connection to update server.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Server , click here to read more
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

ok go into your client files open up client.java press CTRL+F (find)
and search for

Class115.anInt1946 = (Class75_Sub3.anInt3328 == 0 ?

there should be a number next to the question mark 5555 or 43594 or something change that to the port your server is running on default is 43594
set it as what you want save go back then choose build.cmd (compile) then run client

ok if you dont want to release another client leave that as it is
open your server files (508) and go into smd and right click your run choose edit then scroll all the way to the left you should see

server #####

the hashes are whatever number yours is ok change that number to the number that was in your client.java and done!

Read full topic
